name: Argostars - Fierce Parthe
effectText: Gains 700 ATK/DEF for each "Argostars" monster with a different name you control, except this card. You can only use each of the following effects of "Argostars - Fierce Parthe" once per turn. (Quick Effect): You can reveal this card in your hand; return 1 "Argostars" Continuous Trap you control to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon this card. You can banish this card you control; Set 1 Continuous Trap from your hand. It can be activated this turn.
